me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.delivery

Interface SMTPDeliveryEnvelope

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SMTPDeliveryEnvelopeImpl

    public interface SMTPDeliveryEnvelope
    A SMTPDeliveryEnvelope is a complete transaction which is used to deliver an email per SMTP.
    Author:
    Norman Maurer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      SMTPMessage getMessage()
      Return the SMTPMessage which should be used to submit the message after the DATA command was issued
      Collection<String> getRecipients()
      Return a Collection of recipients which should be used for the RCPT TO.
      String getSender()
      Return the sender which should be used for the MAIL FROM.

    • Method Detail

      • getSender

        String getSender()
        Return the sender which should be used for the MAIL FROM. This may return null if a null-sender should be used
        Returns:
        sender

      • getRecipients

        Collection<String> getRecipients()
        Return a Collection of recipients which should be used for the RCPT TO. The returned Collection must at least contain one element.

        The returned Collection is unmodifiable
        Returns:
        recipients not null

      • getMessage

        SMTPMessage getMessage()
        Return the SMTPMessage which should be used to submit the message after the DATA command was issued
        Returns:
        messageInput not null
